import React from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import logo from "../logo.png" import { Link, Outlet } from 'react-router-dom' export default function Navbar(props) { return (
{props.title}
  • Home
  • {props.aboutText}
{/*
*/}
) } Navbar.propTypes = { title: PropTypes.string.isRequired, aboutText: PropTypes.string.isRequired } Navbar.defaultProps = { title:"Title here", aboutText : "about text here" }
